member.name: T:ImageMagick.Web.CacheControlMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode to use for client caching.

member.name: F:ImageMagick.Web.CacheControlMode.NoControl
member.summary: Does not add a max-age to the response.

member.name: F:ImageMagick.Web.CacheControlMode.UseMaxAge
member.summary: Adds a Cache-Control: max-age=>nnn< header to the response based on the value specified in the CacheControlMaxAge property.

member.summary: Class that contains the client cache settings.

member.summary: Gets the HTTP 1.1 cache control maximum age value

member.name: M:ImageMagick.Web.Handlers.MagickHandler.MoveToCache(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves to the specified source file name to the destination file name. This is happening in a lock to avoid problems when an other request is reading the file.
member.param: The name of the file to move to the cache.
The file name of the cache file.

member.summary: Returns the file name that should be send to the response.

member.returns: The file name that should be send to the response.

member.name: M:ImageMagick.Web.Handlers.MagickHandler.CanUseCache(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the cache file is newer then the file name that was resolved by the IUrlResolver.
member.param: The file name of the cache file.
member.returns: True if the cache file is newer

member.name: M:ImageMagick.Web.Handlers.MagickHandler.GetCacheFileName(System.String,System.String,ImageMagick.MagickFormat)
member.summary: Returns the file name that can be used to cache the result.
member.param: The name of the subdirectory to store the files in.
The key that will be used to create MD5 hash and that will be used as a sub directory.
member.returns: The file name that can be used to cache the result.
